isis.stitle: RADIATOR/COOLING SYSTEM SERVICE MANUAL - PROSTAR™ - DESCRIPTION - A/C CONDENSER

svcproc.title: A/C CONDENSER
svcproc.para: The A/C condenser is mounted on the front of the cooling package and the A/C condenser lines are routed over the top of the cooling package. This configuration creates an issue of the A/C condenser needing to be repositioned to service the radiator, charge air cooler, and bottom fan shroud. However, the A/C system does not need to be opened to service any of the cooling package components.
